item.title: Mack Superliner v10.0 v1.54.x [RTA-Mods] ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 31, 2025

Mack Superliner v10.0 v1.54.x [RTA-Mods] ETS2

Features:
Sold at dealers – MACK and IVECO
2 types of cabins and 1 chassis.
Own interior (updated for 1.54 and higher)
Own wheels + added from the old version with processing.
New sounds of the engine, transmissions and interior.
Full support for window animation.

Full support for cable animation, etc.
Has its own rich tuning.

Latest changes:
Completely redesigned model for the new ETS2.
Found and fixed a bug in the collision of a long chassis.
Removed a bug in the animation of cables on a short chassis (the reason was in the collision)
Completely updated the collision of the entire truck.
All chrome parts have been redesigned, both inside and outside.
In the interior, plastic parts have been redesigned and FPS has been optimized.
Now the interior has a new – on-board computer, clock, gear indicator and GPS navigation.
New sounds in the interior, sounds of engines and transmissions.
Updated headlights and parking lights. (rear lights too)
Added support for window animation. (outside and inside)
Updated wheels from the old Mack SuperLiner (Look in the disks – there are versions for chrome and paint)
Fixed all found errors of the previous one.
The game log is completely cleaned up by 100% percent.

Test on ETS2 version: 1.54.1.0s
Will also work on ETS2 version 1.55.

Credits: RTA-Mods. Author of the converter and revision: Maxim Barinov. Author of the clean log: Maxim Barinov.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Iveco S-Way Hi-Powered v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 31, 2025

Iveco S-Way Hi-Powered v1.0 ETS2

This is owr Iveco S-Way Hi-Powered v1.0 mod, for ETS2 from 1.49, 1.50, 1.51, and so on… and it includes:
– a truck, with many skins;
– Standalone status;
– 4 Cabins:
– 8 Chassis: 4×2/LNG, 6×2/Midlift/Taglift,6×4 etc;
– the 6×4 was converted to a 1400 Litres fuel tank capacity;
– Engines: Cursor 9/11/13;
– FNM 11 700 HP, FNM Br V8 800 HP, FNM Xtra 900 HP;
– Include powerfull braking service;
– Interiors: Stock, Weeda Custom;
*Old Owl brownish and cream Collor;
– 15 Transmissions – 6, 12, 15, 16, 18 speed
– Customisable weeda standalone, including almost all tuning options;
– some Skins;
– Lightbox;
– Side skirts;
– Exhaust;
– Bumper;
– Sunshield;
– Bullbar;
– no-damage-data system;
– trailer, with its skin;
– new dashboard;
– new splash-screen;
– template, include in the archive;
– new wjeels and rims pack;
– new lights pack;
– no-dead-ends system;
– new player logo company;
– universal fix and translation and many more.

Credits: SCS, SoapModding, Weeda Transport - the truck, itself; - DaStrobel - no-dead-ends; - kworey - universal fx and translation; - Mvrkvr1n - special wheels and lights; - Brvs1nhv - many other Works, including, but not only, skins.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: KamAZ 4410-6450 v1.54.x+ ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | May 30, 2025

KamAZ 4410-6450 v1.54.x+ ETS2

Autonomous and does not conflict with any KAMAZ.
Purchased at a KAMAZ modification dealer or at a VOLVO store.
Can be painted in any color, also has more than 29 types of skins.
Two types of chassis: 6×6 and 8×8.
Has a little tuning.
3 windshield wiper modes.
There are new accessories for the cabin and toys from Steam.
Has simple off-road wheels of 3 types and dirty off-road wheels of 3 types.
Has new FMOD sounds – KAMAZ (3 types) and YaMZ-238.
There is a new pack of steering wheels with braids. (2 types of steering wheels with 9 types of braids)
With animation of cables, windows with handles

Latest changes;
Completely redone all lighting.
Replaced headlights and lighting with them.
Improved road train lighting.
Improved lighting and turn signal indicators.
Improved lighting on the bumper and turn signal indicators on them.
Replaced shadows on both chassis and the cabin with the original.
Updated physics of all chassis.
Updated collision of chassis and cabin.
Changed radius of smoke output from the muffler.
Fog lights installed on both chassis.
Replaced road train lights and side turn signals on the cabin.
Updated in companies, truck gallery and dealers.
Fixed all errors of the previous version.
Find and fix errors of missing textures.
The log in the game is 100% clean (percent).

Tested on ETS2 version: 1.54.1.0s.
It will also work on ETS2 version 1.55.

Credits: JAWA, dmitry68, Stas556, _69_mf_. Author of conversion and improvements to 1.54+: Maxim Barinov. Author of the pack of steering wheels with braids: Maxim Barinov.

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
